text: If anyone speaks, he should do so as one who speaks the oracles of God; if anyone serves, he should do so as one who serves from 4:11 strength as God supplies it ¦ the strength that God supplies CT TRstrength as God supplies it, so that in all things God may be glorified through Jesus Christ. To him belong the glory and the power forever 4:11 and ever ¦ --- ECM* PCKand ever. Amen.
